titles: Topica sacra: spiritual logick: some brief hints and helps to faith, meditation, and prayer, comfort and holiness. / Communicated at Christ-Church, Dublin, in Ireland. By T.H. minister of the Gospel.
author: Harrison, Thomas, 1619-1682.
publisher: Printed for Francis Titon, and are to be sold at the sign of the three Daggers in Fleet-street.,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
